courseDescription:
This diploma course guides you through the basic concepts and techniques of landscape design and site planning. We examine landscape categories and materials and lay out the objectives and professional scope of landscape design projects.

We then study the historical elements of Oriental and European landscape styles from the architecture of various famous gardens. We go through the various survey methods and techniques employed for site analysis and appraisal. We break down the steps involved in landform design and investigate its driving factors. We establish multiple criteria for plant selection and study the relevant characteristics of botanical materials.

This diploma course explains the main aspects of landscape architecture and site planning. This can help potential landscape architects, gardeners and anyone who wants to understand the world of landscape design and site planning. Sign up to learn how to transform any outdoor space into a wonderland.
